front.title: SIP server IPCP configuration option for PPP

abstract.t: This document defines a new configuration option for the PPP IPCP(PPP Internet Protocol Control Protocol), to return a list of theIPv4 addresses of SIP proxy servers. This option provides one mechanism that a system may use to locate a SIP proxy server.This approach is applicable for a system that is using PPP for thelink layer protocol and IP address allocation.
